subject: My First File
author: Rebecca
full_text:
I just posted part of a recording from yesterday (still going through
all of them).  This was recorded at the farm I grew up on, where my
brother and his family now live.  My two nieces (age 17 and 21) have
had various occurrences there so we thought we'd try out some of this
new stuff and see what we'd get.  We got quite a few interesting
results I think.

This is part of one where we asked if they are there, and then how
many are there. This one was made with EVPMaker (the RS 20-125 didn't
work so well out in the country - maybe not enough noise/sounds for
them to use??)  The answer is "We are at eight, Yeah, there are
eight."  I think it's pretty clear.

What do you think?

~ Becca
